parameters.prompt:
=Generate a detailed, expanded script for a faceless YouTube video based on this concept:

Title: {{$json["title"]}}

Expand the following script outline into a full, well-structured script for a 30-60 minute meditation/relaxation video:

{{$json["script"]}}

The script should include:
1. A compelling introduction (30-60 seconds)
2. Clear segmentation that matches the chapters
3. Smooth transitions between segments
4. A calming, meditative tone appropriate for a faceless channel
5. Guidance for viewers throughout the experience
6. A gentle conclusion with a call to subscribe

Format as a complete script with clear section breaks that match the chapter timestamps.

parameters.command: ffmpeg -i "{{$node["Generate Voice Narration"].binary.data.fileName}}" -i "{{$node["Download Background Music"].binary.data.fileName}}" -i "{{$node["Download Video Assets"].binary.data.fileName}}" -filter_complex "[1:a]volume=0.2[music];[0:a][music]amix=inputs=2:duration=longest[aout]" -map 2:v -map "[aout]" -c:v libx264 -c:a aac -shortest -t 3600 "{{$json["title"]}}.mp4"

parameters.promptText: =Professional YouTube thumbnail for {{$json["title"]}}, cinematic, photorealistic, peaceful scene, 16:9 ratio, high resolution, no text
=YouTube thumbnail design for {{$json["title"]}}, vibrant colors, abstract, zen, meditation concept, digital art style, high contrast, 16:9 ratio

parameters.prompt:
=Create an engaging comment for me to pin on my YouTube video: "{{$json["title\]}}"

The comment should:
1. Thank viewers for watching
2. Ask an engaging question related to the video topic
3. Include a call to action to like, comment, and subscribe
4. Be friendly and conversational
5. Be under 200 characters

Also, generate 5 potential reply templates I can use to respond to common viewer comments. Each reply should be personalized yet generic enough to work for various comments.
